commands.b: Here are the commands for this game:
Draw: Picks up a card from the draw pile and transfers it to your hand.
Play (of card): Puts specified card on top of the discard pile if the move is legal.
Uno (of card): Plays the card if the card is legal and if you would have one card left in your hand after playing it.
Uno2: When the other player only has one card and has not called uno yet, you can call uno on them to make them draw four cards.
Rules: Lists the rules of Uno out.
Commands: Lists the commands of this game.
